comment.author: 33765093@N06
comment._content: What is the date for them? Amunhotep III?

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
The baboons probably date to the reign of King Taharqa of Dynasty 25. Montuemhat was Mayor of Thebes and Governor of Upper Egypt under Taharqa and carried out major building projects in Thebes, including in the Mut Precinct. The rest of the photos in the set give more information about the baboons, their dating and their restoration. 

~Mary McKercher, Photographer, Brooklyn Museum Mut Expedition
